sys_hub_flow.description: The auction status changes according to the current date. if the current date is between the start date and end date it changes to auction in progress, if it is after the end date the auction status changes to auction completed.

sys_hub_flow.name: Change Auction status

sys_variable_value.value: current date=>start date and current date<=end date
